Title: Zine | CMHN
Description: Our Gen Z Advisors, an amazing group of young climate leaders, created this brilliant “zine” for youth about climate emotions and wellness. Our grassroots digital magazine offers a collection of perspectives and tools to support other climate-concerned youth around the emotional impacts of the climate crisis and healthy ways to respond. The content includes writing, paintings, and a music playlist--all accompanied by journal reflections and action tips.
